verses.verse: ( Israel’s Rebellion in Egypt) וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> way·hî - בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> baš·šā·nāh year, הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗ית <WH7637> haš·šə·ḇî·‘îṯ In the seventh בַּֽחֲמִשִׁי֙ <WH2549> ba·ḥă·mi·šî of the fifth month, בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <WH6218> be·‘ā·śō·wr on the tenth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> la·ḥō·ḏeš day בָּ֧אוּ <WH935> bā·’ū came אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <WH582> ’ă·nā·šîm ... מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> miz·ziq·nê some of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel לִדְרֹ֣שׁ <WH1875> liḏ·rōš to inquire אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD, וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> way·yê·šə·ḇū and they sat down לְפָנָֽי׃ס <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nāy before me.
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> way·hî came דְבַר־ <WH1697> ḏə·ḇar- Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> ’ê·lay to me, לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> lê·mōr saying,

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- “ Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of man, דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> dab·bêr speak אֶת־ <WH854> ’eṯ- - זִקְנֵ֤י <WH2205> ziq·nê to the elders יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> wə·’ā·mar·tā and tell אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> ’ă·lê·hem them כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> kōh that this is what אָמַר֙ <WH559> ’ā·mar says: אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah·weh GOD הֲלִדְרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> hă·liḏ·rōš to inquire אֹתִ֖י <WH853> ’ō·ṯî of Me? אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> ’at·tem Have you בָּאִ֑ים <WH935> bā·’îm come חַי־ <WH2416> ḥay- I live, אָ֙נִי֙ <WH589> ’ā·nî As surely as אִם־ <WH518> ’im- I will not אִדָּרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> ’id·dā·rêš be consulted לָכֶ֔ם Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) by you, נְאֻ֖ם 5002 N-msc ( nə·’um) declares אֲדֹנָ֥י 136 N-proper-ms ( ’ă·ḏō·nāy) the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ 3069 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) GOD.

הֲתִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <WH8199> hă·ṯiš·pōṭ Will you judge אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> ’ō·ṯām them, הֲתִשְׁפּ֖וֹט <WH8199> hă·ṯiš·pō·wṭ will you judge [them], בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son אָדָ֑ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of man? אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - תּוֹעֲבֹ֥ת <WH8441> tō·w·‘ă·ḇōṯ the abominations אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> ’ă·ḇō·w·ṯām of their fathers הוֹדִיעֵֽם׃ <WH3045> hō·w·ḏî·‘êm Confront them with

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> wə·’ā·mar·tā and tell אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> ’ă·lê·hem them כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> kōh- that this is what אָמַר֮ <WH559> ’ā·mar says: אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> Yah·weh GOD בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> bə·yō·wm On the day בָּחֳרִ֣י <WH977> bā·ḥo·rî I chose בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> ḇə·yiś·rā·’êl Israel, וָאֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> wā·’eś·śā I swore an oath יָדִ֗י <WH3027> yā·ḏî ... לְזֶ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> lə·ze·ra‘ to the descendants בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> bêṯ of the house יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ of Jacob וָאִוָּדַ֥ע <WH3045> wā·’iw·wā·ḏa‘ and made Myself known לָהֶ֖ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) to them בְּאֶ֣רֶץ 776 Prep-b│N-fsc ( bə·’e·reṣ) in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם 4714 N-proper-fs ( miṣ·rā·yim) of Egypt. וָאֶשָּׂ֨א 5375 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-1cs ( wā·’eś·śā) With an uplifted יָדִ֤י 3027 N-fsc│1cs ( yā·ḏî) hand לָהֶם֙ Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) to them, לֵאמֹ֔ר 559 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lê·mōr) I said אֲנִ֖י 589 Pro-1cs ( ’ă·nî) ‘ I יְהוָ֥ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) am the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ 430 N-mpc│2mp ( ’ĕ·lō·hê·ḵem) your God. ’

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bay·yō·wm day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> ha·hū On that נָשָׂ֤אתִי <WH5375> nā·śā·ṯî I swore יָדִי֙ <WH3027> yā·ḏî ... לָהֶ֔ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) - לְהֽוֹצִיאָ֖ם 3318 Prep-l│V-Hifil-Inf│3mp ( lə·hō·w·ṣî·’ām) to bring them מֵאֶ֣רֶץ 776 Prep-m│N-fsc ( mê·’e·reṣ) out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם 4714 N-proper-fs ( miṣ·rā·yim) of Egypt אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) into אֶ֜רֶץ 776 N-fs ( ’e·reṣ) a land אֲשֶׁר־ 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer-) that תַּ֣רְתִּי 8446 V-Qal-Perf-1cs ( tar·tî) I had searched out לָהֶ֗ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) for them, זָבַ֤ת 2100 V-Qal-Prtcpl-fsc ( zā·ḇaṯ) a land flowing חָלָב֙ 2461 N-ms ( ḥā·lāḇ) with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ 1706 Conj-w│N-ms ( ū·ḏə·ḇaš) and honey, צְבִ֥י 6643 N-ms ( ṣə·ḇî) the glory הִ֖יא 1931 Pro-3fs ( hî) ... לְכָל־ 3605 Prep-l│N-msc ( lə·ḵāl) of all הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ 776 Art│N-fp ( hā·’ă·rā·ṣō·wṯ) lands.

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> wā·’ō·mar And I said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> ’ă·lê·hem to them: אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ’îš ‘ Each of you שִׁקּוּצֵ֤י <WH8251> šiq·qū·ṣê the abominations עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> ‘ê·nāw before his eyes, הַשְׁלִ֔יכוּ <WH7993> haš·lî·ḵū must throw away וּבְגִלּוּלֵ֥י <WH1544> ū·ḇə·ḡil·lū·lê with the idols מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt. אַל־ <WH408> ’al- and you must not תִּטַּמָּ֑אוּ <WH2930> tiṭ·ṭam·mā·’ū defile yourselves אֲנִ֖י <WH589> ’ă·nî I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh am the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê·ḵem your God. ’

וַיַּמְרוּ־ <WH4784> way·yam·rū- But they rebelled בִ֗י Prep│1cs ( ḇî) against Me וְלֹ֤א 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō) and refused אָבוּ֙ 14 V-Qal-Perf-3cp ( ’ā·ḇū) ... לִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ 8085 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( liš·mō·a‘) to listen אֵלַ֔י 413 Prep│1cs ( ’ê·lay) -. אִ֣ישׁ 376 N-ms ( ’îš) None of them אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - שִׁקּוּצֵ֤י 8251 N-mpc ( šiq·qū·ṣê) the abominations עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ 5869 N-cdc│3mp ( ‘ê·nê·hem) before their eyes, לֹ֣א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) - הִשְׁלִ֔יכוּ 7993 V-Hifil-Perf-3cp ( hiš·lî·ḵū) cast away וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) - גִּלּוּלֵ֥י 1544 N-mpc ( gil·lū·lê) the idols מִצְרַ֖יִם 4714 N-proper-fs ( miṣ·ra·yim) of Egypt. לֹ֣א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) and they did not עָזָ֑בוּ 5800 V-Qal-Perf-3cp ( ‘ā·zā·ḇū) forsake וָאֹמַ֞ר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-1cs ( wā·’ō·mar) So I resolved לִשְׁפֹּ֧ךְ 8210 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( liš·pōḵ) to pour out חֲמָתִ֣י 2534 N-fsc│1cs ( ḥă·mā·ṯî) My wrath עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם 5921 Prep│3mp ( ‘ă·lê·hem) upon them לְכַלּ֤וֹת 3615 Prep-l│V-Piel-Inf ( lə·ḵal·lō·wṯ) and vent אַפִּי֙ 639 N-msc│1cs ( ’ap·pî) My anger בָּהֶ֔ם Prep│3mp ( bā·hem) against them בְּת֖וֹךְ 8432 Prep-b│N-msc ( bə·ṯō·wḵ) in אֶ֥רֶץ 776 N-fsc ( ’e·reṣ) the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ 4714 N-proper-fs ( miṣ·rā·yim) of Egypt.

( Israel’s Rebellion in the Wilderness) וָאֽוֹצִיאֵ֖ם <WH3318> wā·’ō·w·ṣî·’êm So I brought them מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> mê·’e·reṣ out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yim of Egypt וָאֲבִאֵ֖ם <WH935> wā·’ă·ḇi·’êm and led them אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- into הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> ham·miḏ·bār the wilderness.
